title: Friend Wanted - Tea, Books, Companionship
text:
Greetings.

I relocated here from a much warmer state. :) My few good friends are all by phone, these days. I'd love to know even one person to go for walks with, or meet for a tea or coffee, and speak to, in person! I should say that I'm usually most comfortable with women friends...age doesn't much matter, nor do the other details.

I'm 43, have two dogs I adore (lab and German shepherd), and a husband. No kids, unfortunately, and very little drama and slim tolerance for it. I'm probably too much of a homebody, so could stand to change that, a bit; I don't work, and so the combination of these things makes it tough to meet potential friends.

I love vintage 20s/30s music, also some classical, bluegrass, 50s country, 80s pop...a variety, really.

I'm a low key person who enjoys solitary pastimes--reading, watching my soaps (yeah, I'll admit it--I even watch a British one. LOL), baking, writing, visiting thrift stores and antiques, etc. I'm trying to teach myself German. :)

I'm content, for the most part, but would welcome some companionship. I'm not so particular as to be only looking for a clone of myself; I'm interested in learning new things, hearing about what my friends enjoy. I'm a decent listener, too, I think.

I'm pretty easy-going, but I do want real life friends, not just texts or email. Occasional texts are fine, but I prefer phone calls. Please get in touch, and let's see what happens!

title: Real Friendship...
text:
I am REALLY reluctant to post this ad because I am SO against drama, but I really want a friend that I see on a regular basis. I have some amazing friends, but I just don't see them enough. So, I really hope to find a true friendship here where we can hang out AT LEAST bi weekly. :) 
A little about me, I'm 27 years old. I'm married to the most amazing guy in the world and together, we have the coolest and sweetest five year old little girl. I am a complete doofus and love to make people laugh. I love to blog (tumblr for the win), color, write poems, take pictures (HUGE passion of mine), cooking, and baking. I'm really creative and apply that in much of what I do. I'm a total caffeine junkie and drink lots of Starbucks. I've been told I make amazing coffee at home too. :) I LOVE metal music. My favorite bands are From Ashes To New, I Prevail, Five Finger Death Punch, and Bring Me The Horizon. I love going to concerts and saw Five Finger Death Punch last year. We are going to Slipknot this year. :) I have a huge heart and love silly things like Pokemon and My Little Pony. (I am getting a tattoo for both). I'm extremely loyal and blunt as fuck. I DO NOT sugar coat anything. I am a realist and believe in accepting life. I have struggled a lot in recent years, having been diagnosed with Fibromyalgia. That set my life back by about 3 years, but I woke up one morning and was like, to hell with this. I'm going back to school soon for family therapy. It's my life's purpose to help others. :) I am 4/20 friendly... I just don't want it around my kid. I accept all types of people. I have trangender, intersex, and non-binary friends. I also like D/s (dom/sub) and would need a friend who accepted these things about me and them. Lastly, I am really finally getting my life together and NEED a friend who wants to share in the good things in life and keep me smiling through this part of my life. I don't need baggage. I need smiles, good memories, and love :D I will obviously return the favor. 

Please DO NOT email me if you're looking for any of the following -
- Drama or someone to gossip too. 
- If you're someone who can't handle the truth. Little bitches ARE NOT welcome in my life. 
- If you plan to involve me in your infidelity. I pride myself on being loyal and trustworthy. If you have ANY intentions of being more than friends, I am NOT the person for you. 
- If you wanna go on and on about your baby momma drama or relationship bullshit. (Now.. let me clarify, if you're having a hard time with a fight or something, I will absolutely support you, but there's a difference between that and a CONSTANTLY unstable and toxic relationship. Know the difference). 
- If you want someone to get plastered with. I DO NOT drink or want any part in it. 
- You are judgmental and not okay with all types of people and dynamics. 

PLEASE DO email me if -
- You want a truthful, positive, long lasting, drama free, friendship.
- You want someone to game or color with.
- You want someone to get coffee with, watch netflix with, or cook/bake with. 
- You are okay with kiddos and or have some of your own.
- You want puppy play dates. 
- You love to laugh and want to laugh so hard your sides hurt. 
- You want someone to drive around with blasting tunes and annoy people. lol
- You are accepting of all people. 
- You are an adult and know how to handle a real friendship. 

If you're still interested, please send me an email. I can send my kik or number. I'm a total textaholic. :) Have a wonderful rest of your week and thanks for reading. :D

title: Is there any other people with anxiety and panic attacks, want to chat
text:
Hello, I suffer from on going panic attacks, and basic anxiety''
Also PTSD, and a few others'', I live with all these day in and day out,
I was on meds for a long time, but I have been off for a few years now,
trying to find something all natural, and there are so many out there,
just don't know what the right mix is, but I'm still working on it.
I wanted to see if there were any others that have these disorders,
that would like to chat'', I find my self alone more often with out anyone to talk to about this stuff,
and it would be great to find someone to talk to, that get's it, that knows what it feels like,
and wants someone else to talk too.
Thank you for taking the time out to read my post''
Take care

title: Platonic only - yes, I hope these relationships still exist...
text: Hey, thanks for clicking on my post. Hopefully this is the first step in making a new friend.. Unfortunately, my work and school schedules are crazy Monday - Thursday, so I'm hoping this will be a good way to meet some new, cool people. BTW, crazy weather we're having?!?! Should be nicer starting tomorrow (Tuesday). So, I know that this Craig's List and this section isn't really for platonic friends anymore; it used to be but I guess not so much now. However, I still have faith that there are still people out there, like myself, that are just looking for friends. Ok, I moved out here a few years back and I make some really good platonic friends on here back then. Unfortunately, they've either moved away to Ballard (you know some place so far away that they refuse to leave their new The Shire to come back to visit the old one) or they actually moved away (out of the area). Again just to be clear, I'm truly just looking for platonic friends to do stuff with. Absolutely no funny business. Period. I'm a laid back, non-smoking, educated, progressive, "lefty", black guy looking to expand my circle. Bottom line, I'm just looking for friends who would be up for grabbing a drink sometime, going to movies, running/jogging, soccer/flag football, working out, hiking, rock climbing and talking. Good conversation is essential; being able to discuss issues [and solutions] in technology, the environment, world events/affairs, non-commerical media, politics (again I'm a proud, educated progressive but very respectful of differing views). I know that's a crazy laundry list, but I'm truly open to meeting new, non-flaky people. If any of this sounds interesting and you're not a flake, please feel free to email me back. Thank you again for clicking and reading. I look forward to melting through the freeze and making some new friends.

title: Where did the passion go
text:
Are you a woman who is trapped in a circumstances of necessity? Do you feel invisible to your lover, unfulfilled and unappreciated? Are you baffled as to why the magic that used to happen in the bedroom when you wore your enticing lingerie has now dissipated? Do you fall asleep at night next to warmth and breathing, longing to be touched, caressed, and desired?

If you answered yes to any of these questions, I can appreciate how you feel as this is how I feel. - I've seen you in my fantasies. You are attractive, sensual, open, adventurous, playful, most importantly, intelligent. And though you've agonized over the potential guilt your decision to read my ad has brought you, you are open to a nontraditional, non-possessive, no drama arrangement with an attentive, caring, and giving gentleman who will treat you with kindness, and fill the emptiness in your life and give you that passion you are missing.

Who are you? You are of no particular age, body style or ethnicity. You do however have a positive outlook, the desire to be wanted and needed. You live for the anticipation, the craving and adoration that you richly deserve, and you sweetly and willingly give that and more in return.

title: that that we were is no more
text:
the day you told me was the last day of a week of foot pounding back snapping work.
i came home you had a bottle and poured drinks knowing i would need sedation.
it was an unusual welcoming, a remnant of our hot sensual, early days.
we slowed down the drinking and the sweltering nights of love
the last few years were all work buying this house.
your face was flat, long, serious. i felt an earthquake rising.
all the rejected bone tired nights of interest in only sleep
floated before my mind's eye painting a picture of our love.
with your impatience to go to a fresh love
you were to tell me 
that that we were is no more.

title: Musician friends?
text:
I am looking for a musician friend. I love music but I have no family or friends that are musicians. I have been learning piano, organ, keyboard, music arranging, singing, and music theory on my own. I know how powerful music is and I want to use it for good. I have dedicated my life to helping other people find meaning in life and the truth and peace they are looking for. I am not using music for my own entertainment, but to reach out and help others. I know the true spirit of music is one of giving. Everything I learn, I share with others. I have already been asked to teach basic music theory, piano, and voice on more than one occasion. I do the best I can with the knowledge I have. I would love to find someone that believes in me and the work I do enough to want to help me. I love to learn. Things are always easier once someone shows you how. You will find me to be a quick, avid learner and grateful friend. I am sure you will find working with me a very rewarding experience. You will not only be helping me, but many other people as well. I am very religious but I am not judgemental. I don't care if you are religious or non-religious, gay or straight, just please remember I am only seeking a platonic friend.

title: Looking for a platonic relationship
text:
So I work 6 days a week from 4am to 11pm. Off on Monday's only. Don't have much of a life as you can imagine. I've been doing this for so long that I've forgotten what it was to sit and chat with a lady. Yes what I'm looking for is a LADY, no I'm not interested in sex just harmless chat over coffee, dinner or a glass of wine. Some days I get lucky and can leave work early, and it usually happens when I'm anxious about something and needing someone to talk to. I've noticed that because of my schedule that over the years I've lost all of my friends and can't find anyone to chat with. This makes life very lonely. 

A bit about myself, I'm a workaholic as you probably figured out. I'm well traveled and love the arts. I'm 50 and I'm not much of an athlete but I'm 6' tall and 200 lbs. , I don't think I'm overweight but I'm not a twig either. I think they call it HWP on CL. So if you are interested in some evening chat, maybe a movie, dinner, wine, coffee or the like, drop me a line. BTW anything we do is my treat. It's a cultural thing so don't think because I pick up the check I want anything more than a nice evening with a nice lady. I don't care how old you are just be between 25 and 70. 

Thanks for taking the time to read this and happy life to all.

title: Too Good of a Friend?
text:
I'm always there for friends, and I've been known to answer the phone in the middle of the night. I'm a great listener and enjoy helping people navigate through tough times and love celebrating the good times. I don't miss events that are important to close friends and sometimes acquaintances. But it seems that things don't always go both ways. I know who the reliable people are and of course they are a high priority, but sometimes I just help too much when maybe I shouldn't.

Of course the obvious answer is to keep being there for people and know when to cut people off. But it it gets old sometimes, right? 

Anyway, tell me what you think. What's on your mind? And if you have something completely unrelated and need to talk, I enjoy listening. I just can't put my number on here because I'd get some strange calls from CL people, I'm sure. And no, I'm not ugly :P
